headerTow: How the design thinking process can solve team problems
desTow: Learn all about the design thinking methodology, and how you can use it to solve the challenges your team encounters.
desAll: Maybe they just aren’t aware of the product. You might try to increase your marketing efforts in those regions, hire new sales reps, or offer a discount. But you would potentially be risking time, money, and energy on a tactic that doesn’t have a clear reason behind it. Instead, use design thinking. Design thinking is a different way of approaching problems that will help you determine why the product is not selling in a certain region and what you can do to change that.
